sentence.Network_en: In 1855 she was made Inspector of all hospitals in the Crimea.
sentence.Network_cn: 1855年她被任命为克里米亚所有医院的监察员.

sentence.Network_en: Crimea and Caucasus peninsula map has been improved with the addition of many new military objects.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们改进了克里米亚和高加索半岛的地图,增加了大量的军事实体.

sentence.Network_en: If we can route this Russians this final time, we will have liberated Crimea.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果在最后关头消灭这股俄军, 我们将解放克里米亚.

list.abs: 2007年4月30日 - 中新社北京四月三十日电(记者张蒙)英国当红摇滚乐队the crimea(克里米亚)携手内地知名乐队“浪漫假日”,日前在北京星美国际影城进行了精彩的表演。.
